title.narrative: Electronic Prepaid Solution Scaling-up Aid Disbursement and Financial Inclusion

description.narrative: In partnership with Visa, private sectors and government, Oxfam will continue to intensify use of digital payment for emergency and development cash transfer programs through electronic prepaid system. Banking on the successful simulation results of EPS in urban and rural areas affected by disasters (i.e. typhoon Glenda and Ruby), a scale -up program will be implemented to: 1) enhance EPS disbursement developed infrastructures to efficiently deliver additional scale, increase platform capabilities and strengthen infrastructure functionalities; and 2) promote financial inclusion of disaster affected population.

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY
